all-time.translation[0].definitions[0].d: used when you compare things to say that one of them is the best, worst etc that there has ever been
all-time.translation[0].definitions[0].e: They reached an all-time record score.
The price of wheat had reached an all-time low.
all-time.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the lowest or highest that something has ever been
all-time.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The news caused the dollar to fall to an all-time low against the euro.
Orders rose 35% to an all-time high for May.
